context: Does the dock charge a mini controller?
response: It will charge two Wii Remotes the Gamepad and a Wireless Pro Controller all at the same time. The Wireless Pro Controller is a standard USB(a) plug it seems.

context: I have a Wii that I need to connect to my Vizio E550i-B2.  If I buy this cable, where do I insert the video portion?  I also have HD cables connected.
response: The cable is connected to the composite inputs of the TV. Green cable to y/v, Blue goes to pb/cb, Red goes to Pr/cr inputs. Those 3 are for the vidio. The Red and White marked audio, go to the Right and Left Audio Inputs. Hope this helps
